TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509ChainPolicy extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示在生成 X509 证书链时要应用的链策略。

span.span: Represents the chain policy to be applied when building an X509 certificate chain.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 对象都可以有一个 属性，该属性指定要在验证过程中使用的策略。Each object can have an property that specifies the policy to be used in the verification process. 请注意，只有 对象才能构造 对象。Note that only objects can construct an object. ## Examples 下面的示例将打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许用户选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于所选的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个对象标识符 (OID) 集合，这些对象标识符指定证书必须支持的应用程序策略或增强型密钥使用 (EKU)。

span.span: Gets a collection of object identifiers (OIDs) specifying which application policies or enhanced key usages (EKUs) the certificate must support.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此集合为空。By default, this collection is empty. 你可以使用以下代码将其他对象标识符) (Oid 添加到集合中：You can add additional object identifiers (OIDs) to the collection using the following code: [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/remarks.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/remarks.cs#5)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/remarks.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的示例将打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许用户选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于所选的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示链引擎是否可以使用颁发机构信息访问 (AIA) 扩展找到未知的颁发者证书。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the chain engine can use the Authority Information Access (AIA) extension to locate unknown issuer certificates.

value.span: 如果禁用使用 AIA 扩展，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if using the AIA extension is disabled; otherwise, .

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象表示验证证书链时可由链引擎搜索的其他证书集合。

span.span: Gets an object that represents an additional collection of certificates that can be searched by the chaining engine when validating a certificate chain.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 协议（如安全套接字层 (SSL) 和安全 MIME (S/MIME) 允许包含用于验证证书链的其他证书;这些证书可证明在验证过程中有用。Protocols such as Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) and Secure MIME (S/MIME) allow the inclusion of additional certificates for use in validating a certificate chain; these certificates can prove to be useful in the validation process. 此属性允许将这些证书传递给链验证引擎。This property allows these certificates to be passed to the chain validation engine. 默认情况下，此集合为空。By default, this collection is empty.

summary.span: 获取或设置验证链所用的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time for which the chain is to be validated.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示链验证的时间参数。This property represents the time parameter for chain validation. 此属性返回一个值，该值指示要作为本地时间或 UTC 验证链的时间，具体取决于属性的值 。This property returns a value indicating the time the chain is to be validated, either as local time or UTC, depending on the value of the property. 验证签名消息时，此属性很重要，因为签名必须在签名时有效，而不是在验证时有效。This property is important when validating signed messages, since the signature must have been valid at the time of signing, not at the time of validation. 证书链中的每个证书的 时间都不得晚于此属性的值，并且 时间不能早于此属性的值。Every certificate in the chain must have a time no later than this property's value and a time no earlier than this property's value. 否则，将对 标志进行断言。Otherwise, the flag is asserted. 此属性还可用于确定证书的吊销状态。This property may also be used to determine the revocation status of a certificate. 类的无参数构造函数 将 属性设置为调用构造函数的时间。The parameterless constructor for the class sets the property to the time the constructor is called. 调用 方法会将的值替换 为当前系统时间，而不是对象的构造时间。Calling the method replaces the value of with the current system time, not with the time that the object was constructed. ## Examples 下面的示例将打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许用户选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于所选的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]
